message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $10,000. I believe it's a great value and will be very beneficial for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your budget, but $6,000 is too low for me.  How about we split the difference from our previous offers and settle at $8,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we meet at $7,000? I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'm still trying to be mindful of my budget.
